game.name: Quasimorph
game.genres: Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 어두운 제거형 턴제 RPG에서 강화된 PMC 파이터 역할을 수행하세요. 용서란 없는 전투에 참여하고, 우주선을 관리하고, 클론의 시체를 쌓아 모든 생명을 위협하는 존재 뒤에 숨겨진 어두운 미스터리를 풀어내십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take on a role of a hardened PMC fighter in a dark turn-based extraction RPG. Engage in unforgiving combat, manage your ship and pile up the bodies of your clones to unravel the dark mystery behind threat to all life.
